overview: The film belongs to a series of films like Anwar Wagdy, with his wife Laila Murad, who promoted the idea of alienating class differences between people, especially lovers. The film is not accurate in presenting the information it provides. For example, the titles of the film show that the songs of the film are written by Hussein al-Sayyid and are composed by Riad al-Sunbati. [1] The poster shows that the composer Ahmed Sidqi participated in the composition of the film, The religious "Ya Rayehin of the dear prophet" is written by Abu al-Saud al-Abiari as the records of the Egyptian radio
title: بنت الاكابر
